DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect i-gel Laryngeal mask airway Supreme ( LMA-Supreme ) ventilation parameter surgical view Trendelemburg Position laparoscopic gynecological surgery case administer positive pressure ventilation without use neuromuscular agent .
DOC.brief_title: I-gel v LMA Supreme Laparoscopic Gynecological Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , randomize double-blind study , age 18 65 year undergoing elective laparoscopic gynecological surgery . The patient randomly assign 2 group : - Group 1 : i-gel - Group 2 : LMA- Supreme Procedure : The investigation protocol contain follow section : 1 . Induction anaesthesia . For preoperative sedation 0.02 mg/kg midazolam IV administer . 2 minute 0.2 µ/kg/min remifentanil 6 mg kg st-1 propofol infusion , IV 1-2 mg kg-1 propofol . No muscle relaxant use insertion airway device . 2 . Bispectral index value hold 40-60.Bispectral index value within interval increase decrease propofol infusion 1 mg/kg additional bolus dose propofol ( 1 mg/kg ) . 3 . Insertion airway device . The size airway device use base manufacturer ' recommendation . All device deflate lubricate prior use . Once insert , cuff inflate manometer 60 cm H20 Data record : size airway device , time number attempt . 4 . Anesthesia maintenance ensure 50 % O2/air 0.1-0.4 µ kg/min-1 remifentanil 50-150 µ kg/ min-1 ( 4-10 mg/kg/hr ) propofol IV infusion 5 . Functionality gastric drainage channel airway device : passage 14 G size tube . 6 . Measurement airway seal pressure ( oropharyngeal leak pressure ( OLP ) : baseline , 2 minute airway device insertion ( T1 ) , 10 minute insufflation ( T2 ) , desufflation ( T3 ) , removal airway device ( T4 ) . The maximum pressure allow 40 cm H2O . 7 . Ventilatory mechanic parameter hemodynamic parameter measure baseline , T1 , T2 , T3 T4 . 8 . Perioperative complication : Cough , vomit , laryngeal spasm , laryngeal Stridor , airway intervention requirement , hypoxia ( SpO2 < 92 % ) 9 . Removal airway device : Presence blood - 3 level grading ( 1 : blood ; 2 : trace amount blood ; 3 : clear amount blood ) . Complications : sore throat ( VAS:10-point scale ) , dysphonia ( yes/no ) , dysphagia ( yes/no ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . American Society Anesthesiologists classification group III 2. 1865 year 3. undergoing elective laparoscopic gynecological surgery 1 . Those neck upper respiratory tract pathology 2 . Those risk gastric content regurgitation/aspiration ( previous upper Gastrointestinal system surgery , know hiatus hernia , gastroesophageal reflux , history peptic ulcer , full stomach , pregnancy ) 3 . Those low pulmonary compliance high airway resistance ( chronic pulmonary disease ) 4 . Obese patient ( BMI > 35 ) 5 . Those throat pain , dysphagia dysphonia 6 . Those possible previous difficult airway 7 . Those operation plan long 4 hour 8 . Conversion laparatomy 9 . Neuromuscular block agent use
